price: 74 Ton Seigneur sait aussi bien ce qu’ils dissimulent au fond d’eux-mêmes que ce qu’ils expriment ouvertement.
arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تُكِنُّ صُدُورُهُمۡ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-inna rabbaka layaʿlamu mā tukinnu ṣudūruhum wamā yuʿ'linūna
